entities.description: bookindex is formally defined as a triplet structure for representing document information
a tree structure is part of the bookindex  representing the document s logical hierarchy
a knowledge graph is part of the bookindex  capturing fine grained entities and their relations
the graph tree link is a mapping function linking entities to tree nodes within the bookindex
t is a variable representing the tree structure component of the bookindex
g is a variable representing the knowledge graph component of the bookindex
m is a variable representing the graph tree link function within the bookindex
n is a variable representing the set of nodes in the tree structure
e t is a variable representing the nesting relationships in the tree structure
v is a variable representing the set of entities in the knowledge graph
e g is a variable representing the set of relations in the knowledge graph

relations.description: bookindex is defined as containing t  which represents the tree structure
bookindex is defined as containing g  which represents the knowledge graph
bookindex is defined as containing m  which represents the graph tree link function
t is defined as containing n  the set of nodes in the tree structure
t is defined as containing e t  the nesting relationships in the tree structure
g is defined as containing v  the set of entities in the knowledge graph
g is defined as containing e g  the set of relations in the knowledge graph
m is a function that maps from v  the set of entities in the knowledge graph
m is a function that maps entities to nodes in n  the set of tree nodes
